type: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc
typeCode: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown
issuedBy: Internet of logistics code of issuing party.
key: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

booking-head.WeightUnitCode: Weight unit code for the invoice
booking-head.DimensionsUnitCode: Dimensions unit code for the invoice
booking-head.VolumeUnitCode: Volume unit code for the invoice
booking-head.ShipmentTypeCode: Total, part or split consignment indicator
booking-head.LoadTypeCode: Bulk or containerized (BLK or ULD) indicator
booking-head.DeckPosition: Position of the shipment in the aircraft - e.g. lower or main deck
booking-head.ConsolDirectLCflag: Shipment type indicator - e.g. D for Direct, C for Consolidation or L for Letter of Credit
booking-head.CustomsOriginCode: Customs transit status / information / reference / code
booking-head.RatingTypeIndicator: Transportation rating type - e.g. F for Face, P for Published, or A for Actual Rating detail

PrepaidCollectFlag.WeightValuationCharges: Weight Valuation payment code - e.g. at origin (prepaid) or at destination (collect)
PrepaidCollectFlag.OtherCharges: Other Charges payment code - e.g. at origin (prepaid) or at destination (collect)

OriginLocation.CodeIssuer: Issuer of location code - e.g. IATA, UN/LOCODE, ICAO…
OriginLocation.Code: Location code of airport, freight terminal, seaport, rail station…
OriginLocation.Name: Location name
OriginLocation.Type: Location type - e.g. Airport, FreightTerminal, RailStation, Other, Seaport…

OriginAddress.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

GeoLocation.DockElevationMetric: Dock elevation in meters from building's ground level
GeoLocation.DockApproachInfo: Dock approach information / direction for approach - e.g. entry from SouthWest
GeoLocation.DockFloor: Floor number of building where dock is located
GeoLocation.DockOtherInfo: Other dock information - e.g. access times, security id…

DestinationLocation.CodeIssuer: Issuer of location code - e.g. IATA, UN/LOCODE, ICAO…
DestinationLocation.Code: Location code of airport, freight terminal, seaport, rail station…
DestinationLocation.Name: Location name
DestinationLocation.Type: Location type - e.g. Airport, FreightTerminal, RailStation, Other, Seaport…

DestinationAddress.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

GeoLocation.DockElevationMetric: Dock elevation in meters from building's ground level
GeoLocation.DockApproachInfo: Dock approach information / direction for approach - e.g. entry from SouthWest
GeoLocation.DockFloor: Floor number of building where dock is located
GeoLocation.DockOtherInfo: Other dock information - e.g. access times, security id…

booking-shipment-reference.DocumentID: Reference number allocated to a consignment as per shipper / agent / issuing carrier agreement
booking-shipment-reference.DocumentIDAdditional: Additional shipment information that supplements the reference number
booking-shipment-reference.FreightForwarderReferenceNumber: Freight Forwarder reference used to identify a specific booking or file
booking-shipment-reference.OtherPartyReferenceNumber: Other party reference used to identify a specific booking or file
booking-shipment-reference.CustomsReferenceNumber: Unique identification number assigned by the Customs to the related invoice - e.g. UCR

booking-reference-document.DocumentName: Name of the referenced document - must correspond to DocumentType

booking-currency.BaseCurrency: Base or origin currency - ISO alpha 3 code
booking-currency.TargetCurrency: Target or destination currency - ISO alpha 3 code
booking-currency.ExchangeRateFor1BaseUnit: Amount of target currency for 1 unit of base currency - e.g. [amount in base currency] x [exchange rate] = [amount in target currency]

booking-shipper.Name: Name of company or organization
booking-shipper.LegalRegistrationNumber: Company's legal registration number at the specified address
booking-shipper.TaxID: Company's tax ID at the specified address

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

booking-consignee.Name: Name of company or organization
booking-consignee.LegalRegistrationNumber: Company's legal registration number at the specified address
booking-consignee.TaxID: Company's tax ID at the specified address

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

booking-freight-forwarder.Name: Name of company or organization
booking-freight-forwarder.LegalRegistrationNumber: Company's legal registration number at the specified address
booking-freight-forwarder.TaxID: Company's tax ID at the specified address
booking-freight-forwarder.IATAcargoAccreditationNumber: IATA accredited cargo agent number or identifier
booking-freight-forwarder.IATAcargoCASSnumber: IATA CASS cargo agent branch number or identifier
booking-freight-forwarder.PIMAid: Participant Identification and Message Addressing - air cargo industry EDI messaging address

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

booking-other-party.Role: Other party's role - e.g. Consignor, Exporter, Manufacturer, Carrier, FreightForwarder, Consignee, Importer, Payer, Payee, ShipTo, ShipFrom, BillTo, BillFrom, RemitTo, RemitFrom, Shipper

Company.Name: Name of company or organization
Company.LegalRegistrationNumber: Company's legal registration number at the specified address
Company.TaxID: Company's tax ID at the specified address

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

booking-accounting.ItemValue: Accounting information Item value - e.g PAYMENT BY CERTIFIED CHEQUE…

SpecialHandlingCode.Code: Special handling code following IATA standards
SpecialHandlingCode.Description: Special handling description following IATA standards

PieceID.UPIDIssuer: Issuer of the UPID identifier - e.g. GS1…
PieceID.UPID: Unique Piece Identifier for the piece / package - e.g. GS1 SSCC-18 code
PieceID.ShippingMarks: Free text the marks and / or numbers shown on a piece / package / pallet / ULD

ReferenceDocument.DocumentName: Name of the referenced document - must correspond to DocumentType

Goods.ContentDescription: General description of the piece contents (not a detailed description of products / items / articles contained within)
Goods.CustomsOriginCode: Customs transit status / information / reference / code

PackageType.Code: Packaging type identifier as per UN.ECE Rec 20 Annex II
PackageType.Description: Packaging type description as per UN.ECE Rec 20 Annex II

ULD.Type: Standard Unit Load Device type code
ULD.ATAdesignator: US / ATA Unit Load Device type code
ULD.LoadingIndicator: ULD height or loading limitation code
ULD.OwnerCodeIssuer: Issuer of the ULD owner code
ULD.OwnerCode: Owner code of the ULD in aa, an or na format - owner can be an airline or leasing company

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

booking-piece.SLAC: Shipper's Load And Count - number of individual pieces provided by the shipper (loose, palletized or in the ULD)

Weight.NetWeight: Net weight of the contents of the piece / package
Weight.TareWeight: Weight of empty packaging, pallet or ULD for the piece
Weight.GrossWeight: Total weight of piece / package / pallet / ULD

LinkedMovement.SequenceNumber: Sequence number of the movement for this piece
LinkedMovement.SpaceAllocationDetails: Space allocation request / action / confirmation code or details

ReferenceDocument.DocumentName: Name of the referenced document - must correspond to DocumentType

Weight.GrossWeight: Gross weight of piece / package / ULD

Goods.Description: Generic text description of the goods
Goods.OriginCountryCode: Origin country ISO code of the goods

HarmonizedCommodityCode.Issuer: Issuer of Harmonized Commodity codes - e.g. WCO…

CommodityCode.Issuer: Issuer of commodity classification codes - e.g. Brussels Tariff Nomenclature, EU Harmonized System Code, UN Standard...International Trade Classification

Rating.RatingTypeIndicator: Transportation rating type - e.g. F for Face, P for Published, or A for Actual Rating detail
Rating.RateClassCode: Commodity identifier on which the rate class code is applied
Rating.RCP: City code of Rate Combination Point (RCP), the point over which sector rates are combined
Rating.ULDRateClassType: Unit Load Device rate class type
Rating.RateClassCodeBasis: Basis on which the Rate Class Code is applicable
Rating.RateReferenceCode: A unique code to indicate the applicable rate
Rating.RateReferenceType: Type of rate - e.g. contract, adhoc, etc.
Rating.ItemTotalCharge: Total charge of for this line item

ReferenceDocument.DocumentName: Name of the referenced document - must correspond to DocumentType

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the product identifer - e.g. UPC, EAN, Amazon…

CommodityCode.Issuer: Issuer of the Commodity Code - e.g. Brussels Tariff Nomenclature, EU Harmonized System Code, UN Standard International Trade…

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

Characteristic.Value: Product characteristic value / attribute - e.g. Blue…

Price.UnitPrice: Product price per unit in the base currency
Price.UnitCode: Unit code for item - e.g. piece, unit, kg, pack, hour, minute…
Price.QuantityForUnitPrice: Product quantity for unit price - e.g. 12 (eggs for one USD 1)

booking-product-line.SubTotalAmount: Product subtotal before discount and tax - CALCULATED: Quantity x UnitPrice / QuantityForUnitPrice
booking-product-line.TotalDiscountAmount: Total discount amount - CALCULATED: Amount + OtherAmount
booking-product-line.TotalTaxAmount: Tax amount - CALCULATED: BaseAmount x Percent
booking-product-line.TotalAmount: Total line amount after discount and tax - CALCULATED: SubTotalAmount - TotalDiscountAmount + TotalTaxAmount

Item.ItemQuantity: Item quantity - e.g. 1 for items with precise serial numbers (e.g. smartphones) or more for bulk items with quantity units in weight instead of items (e.g. tomatoes…)

ItemID.SerialNumber: If applicable, individual product serial number for each product of the current line

OtherID.Type: Identifier type or description - e.g. wifi mac address, bluetooth address…

Production.ProductExpiryDate: Product expiry date - e.g. for perishables goods or goods with programmed obsolescence

booking-movement.Type: Movement type - e.g. Pre-Carriage, Main-Carriage or On-Carriage. Always defaults to Main-Carriage.
booking-movement.ModeCode: Mode of transport code following UNECE Recommendation N. 19 - Code for Modes of Transport

CarrierCompany.Name: Name of company / organization
CarrierCompany.IATAairlinePrefix: IATA prefix number assigned to airline

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

booking-movement.FlightNumberLineID: Airline flight number or rail/truck/maritime line id

TransportEquipment.RegistrationID: Vehicle identification - e.g. vehicle registration number
TransportEquipment.Type: Vehicle or container type following United Nations Directories for Electronic Data Interchange Code List
TransportEquipment.Size: Size of the vehicle - free text

Loading.DateTime: Date and time at which the goods are loaded onto the vehicle

LoadingCompany.Name: Name of company / organization
LoadingCompany.IATAcargoAccreditationNumber: IATA accredited cargo agent number or identifier
LoadingCompany.IATAcargoCASSnumber: IATA CASS cargo agent branch number or identifier
LoadingCompany.IATAairlinePrefix: IATA prefix number assigned to airline

LoadingLocation.Name: Location name

GeoLocation.DockApproachInfo: Dock approach information / direction for approach - e.g. entry from SouthWest
GeoLocation.DockFloor: Floor number of building where dock is located
GeoLocation.DockOtherInfo: Other dock information - e.g. access times, security id…

booking-other-customs-info.CustomsSubjectCode: Customs subject code - e.g. IMP for import, EXP for export, AGT for Agent, ISS for The Regulated Agent Issuing the Security Status for a Consignment etc.  At least one of the three elements (Country Code, Information Identifier or Customs, Security and Regulatory Control Information Identifier) must be completed
booking-other-customs-info.CustomsContentCode: Customs content code - e.g. Item Number I, Exemption Legend L, System Downtime Reference S, Unique Consignment Reference Number U, Movement Reference Number M
booking-other-customs-info.SupplementaryCustomsInformation: Supplementary party or location information for customs reporting

booking-insurance.PayingParty: Party covering the insurance - e.g. Consignor, Consignee, Freight Forwarder…

InsuranceCompany.Name: Name of company / organization
InsuranceCompany.ID: Company's unique identifier at insurance company
InsuranceCompany.AccountNumber: Company's account number at insurance company
InsuranceCompany.LegalRegistrationNumber: Insurance company's legal registration number at the specified address
InsuranceCompany.TaxID: Insurance company's tax ID at the specified address

IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO...

Address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility

Contact.Description: Contact description -  e.g. work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

ContactOther.Issuer: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Skype, Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook…

booking-insurance.InsuredAmount: Insured amount - amount covered by the insurance policy
booking-insurance.Charge: Insurance charge - e.g. amount billed by the insurance company for the insurance policy

ChargeDescription.LocationIndicator: Other Charge Location indicator - e.g. Origin (O) or Transit (T) or Destination(D)

SpecialService.DateTime: Special service scheduled date and time

ChargePayment.ByTime: Amount of time for which the charge is applied
ChargePayment.ByItemQuantity: Number of items for which the charge is applied
ChargePayment.PrepaidCollectIndicator: Other Charges payment indicator - e.g. at origin (prepaid) or at destination (collect)

Carriage.NoCarriageValue: NVD (No Value Declared) indicator when no value is declared for carriage

Customs.NoCustomsValue: NCV (No Customs Value) indicator when no value is declared for customs

Insurance.NoInsuranceValue: XXX indicator when no value is declared for insurance

Prepaid.TotalOtherChargesDueAgent: Total charges due Agent / Forwarder amount

Collect.TotalOtherChargesDueAgent: Total charges due Agent / Forwarder amount

InDestinationCurrency.TotalCharges: CALCULATED: Total Charges converted to destination currency as per CURRENCY conversion rate

Location.CodeIssuer: Issuer of location code - e.g. IATA, ICAO…
Location.Code: Location code - e.g. city, seaport, airport, freight terminal, rail station or other place
Location.Name: Location full name

Location.CodeIssuer: Issuer of location code - e.g. IATA, ICAO…
Location.Code: Location code - e.g. city, seaport, airport, freight terminal, rail station or other place
Location.Name: Location full name

Piece.TotalULDCount: Total count of Piece lines with ULD description
Piece.TotalNetWeight: Total goods net weight (sum of pieces net weight)
Piece.TotalTareWeight: Total tare weight (sum of pieces tare weight)
Piece.TotalGrossWeight: Total goods gross weight (sum of pieces gross weight)
Piece.TotalVolume: Total goods volume (sum of pieces volume)
